title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa', and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: After modifying the default value of the list box in the Edit Parameter dialog, the modified default value is not retained and reverts back to the original default value.
SR: 5. Observe that the modified default value 'aaa' is not retained and the original default value 'aa' is displayed instead.
